comment.author: 42934105@N07
comment._content: My mother comes from Kristiansund, born in 1940, she grew up through the occupation. I have some of my Grandfather's 35mm negatives from this period and as well as 16mm film footage of bombing aftermath and fires during the night if the Archive is interested. I believe his diaries are  already in the archive. Harald Helsing. Kind regards Mark Kisby mark@kisby.net
